title: John Martyn (Folk) - God's Song (Dutch Treat B042 VBR MP3 )
description:
Was looking for Ben Howard songs (more than Great) and came across one of his examples I missed. So I listened (and yes I am ashamed I totally missed him).

Some Real old-school Folk and mostly poor recordings. However you can hear why he is an example for many promising singer song writers. So I selected - maybe not the best songs Ã¢â‚¬â€œ but most certainly 30 of his best tracks. Ideal if you do not know John and quite pleasant if you just want to enjoy his music.

The best albums I found and I recommend are: On The Cobbles and The Church With One Bell. They sound quite good as well.

Enjoy,


Dutch Treat - ^B042 God's Song (John Martyn)
